talk.author: did:plc:nsmai5kqm7tl7t6roprkl3kg
talk.utter:
I'm really sorry too! It means the majority of us are clueless assholes. 
But it's not wrong to be suspicious of the powerful, nefarious bros who "won" this campaign. They would cheat in any way possible. In a heartbeat.

talk.author: did:plc:lr6pcl47wsyauqiptmv2eics
talk.utter: Not the majority of you! Just the largest minority of you. Turnout was nowhere near 100%.

talk.author: did:plc:nsmai5kqm7tl7t6roprkl3kg
talk.utter: No. A lot of Democrats stayed home. Frankly that still makes them clueless selfish jerks. In a more saintly mood I might see these election abstainers as some sort of victim, but today I only see people who shirked their duty
